name: Tower Wiz
description:
Tower Wiz is a tower defense game that you play in first person. Construct towers in a new way by selecting the projectile then the effect. You are a master wizard. As such you must defend the land from all kinds of threats. Recently, a evil wizard
has trapped the citizens of a large kingdom within a powerful spell. To break the spell, you must travel across many lands to charge a spell of your own to break it.
